title: Palatial Five-Star Mediterranean Escape on France's South Coast with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description: Opulence, charm and history go hand-in-hand at the InterContinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu, housed in a restored 12th-century building set amid the spectacular Panier neighbourhood. Indulge in a rejuvenating facial at the acclaimed Spa by Clarins or enjoy a decadent meal inspired by local cuisine at the Michelin-starred Alcyone restaurant. For an inspiring night out, explore the Vieux Port, stunning architecture and world-class dining options on your doorstep.
location_description: InterContinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu, an IHG Hotel

title: Five-Star Marseille Sofitel Luxury Near Palais du Pharo with Three Restaurants & Bars & Serene Spa
description:
Bask in the luxury of French elegance and sophistication in the heart of Marseille’s historic Old Port district. This Sofitel retreat boasts breathtaking views of the Mediterranean Sea, just steps away from charming streets and iconic landmarks, including the Basilique Notre-Dame de la Garde and Palais du Pharo.

Savour the hotel's rich gastronomic scene across two onsite restaurants, each offering a delectable dining experience. Head to Le Dantès Skylounge bar, where you can perch up with a cocktail on the terrace while enjoying stunning sea views. For ultimate relaxation, the hotel’s lavish spa features a range of rejuvenating treatments, including a serene pool and sauna.

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles
title: Stylish Marseille City Escape Opposite Saint Charles Station
description: Located opposite the city’s largest transport hub, Holiday Inn Express Marseille - Saint Charles, an IHG Hotel, offers guests unrivalled access to Marseille's historic Viex-Port and the majestic Basilique Notre-Dame de la Garde. After days spent exploring one of France’s most beguiling cities - including the nearby upscale shopping district Les Terrasses du Port, boasting spectacular seaside views and countless boutiques - head to Le Mistral bar for cognac and fine wine.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Marseille - Saint Charles, an IHG Hotel

vendor_name: Grand Hôtel Beauvau Marseille Vieux-Port - MGallery Collection
title: Historic Marseille Escape in the Heart of Old Port
description:
Experience the timeless elegance of sunny France with a stay in Marseille, the oldest city in France. Nestled in the historic Vieux-Port district, this grand haven built in 1816 is steps from the lively Le Panier neighborhood, famous for its winding streets, colorful markets, and cozy cafes. After a day of discovery, retreat to your elegantly designed room and relax beneath the stars that light up the sky over the Old Port.

When you're ready to explore, the hotel’s prime location provides easy access to the city's must-see sights, including Notre-Dame de la Garde and the iconic modernist architecture of Le Corbusier’s Cité Radieuse.
location_description: Grand Hôtel Beauvau Marseille Vieux-Port - MGallery Collection

title: Elegant Marseille France Stay near Le Dôme Concert Hall
description: Uncover the captivating history of France's oldest city from the refined elegance of Crowne Plaza Marseille - Le Dôme, an IHG Hotel. Delight in a culinary journey at Cucina Victoria restaurant, tantalizing your taste buds with exquisite wines and gastronomic flare. Indulge in a refreshing dip in the seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Beyond your doors, immerse yourself in the vibrant music scene at the nearby Le Dôme concert hall or meander through the ancient streets of Marseille.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Marseille - Le Dôme, an IHG Hotel
